subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: Fear and loathing at OCC
body:

This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



Fear and loathing at OCC
Fear and loathing at OCC Tiger Woods gets in an early practice round at Oakmont. (Getty Images)


    

      
      We've got drama for this week's U.S. Open: Oakmont 
      Country Club -- arguably the most difficult course in the 
      country; Tiger 
      -- missed the Open cut in '06; Phil 
      -- ah, Phil, he of the galactic meltdown at Winged Foot. Catch Steve 
      Elling's coverage all week from Pa. | Tee 
      times  •  Elling this 
      week: Torturous No. 8 | Miller's 63 | Mickelson's psyche •  
      Daily: Kostis' Korner | Wed.: Lubin handicaps field | OCC's 
      past
 






 

 





 NBA Finals: 3 games this week (if necessary)


    

      
      Game 3 is Tuesday night in Cleveland and, by the way, the Cavs 
      are in deep trouble. Only a miracle separates Tim Duncan 
      (pictured) and Co. from a fourth ring ... even then Vegas would make the 
      Spurs the chalk.
    

  
• Mejia: Too easy for Spurs | Ratto: Poor TV ratings
